alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, north central Lonoke and south central White Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lonoke, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lonoke... Beebe... Ward... Thurman... Sisemore... Sylvania... Butlerville... Woodlawn... Fairview in Lonoke County... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
